input: Execute a batch request to propose borrower changes for loan UUIDs 87654321-fedc-ba98-7654-3210fedcba98 and 33333333-4444-5555-6666-777777777777, including default values.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests/87654321-fedc-ba98-7654-3210fedcba98/SAP__self.ProposedByLCUUID HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "87654321-fedc-ba98-7654-3210fedcba98"}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests/33333333-4444-5555-6666-777777777777/SAP__self.ProposedByLCUUID HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "33333333-4444-5555-6666-777777777777"}

--request-separator--
